name: Battle for Coblin Cave
description:
The Goblins are hoarding treasure!

Honeydew has scouted out a hidden Goblin treasure. But oh bother, it's guarded by a lot, and I mean A LOT, of goblins! 

Manage your funds and send in experienced and some not so experienced (ahem) dwarf warriors! Be careful though, you might run out of funds if you don't plan ahead!

This game was developed for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021! Made using Construct 2

* This game has been minimally tested on android devices, mobile support not 100% guaranteed.
